mapper.select: SELECT username, password, gender, birthday, email, province, city FROM USER WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(username, password, gender, birthday, email, province, city, age) VALUE(#{username}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{birthday, jdbcType=DATE}, #{email}, #{province}, #{city}, #{age})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET gender=#{gender} WHERE id=#{id}
